alert.note: Alert for Prairie; White; Woodruff (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 11 at 11:12PM CDT until March 12 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Woodruff County in eastern Arkansas... Northern Prairie County in central Arkansas... Southern White County in central Arkansas... * Until 1100 PM CST. * At 1012 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Beebe, or 11 miles northeast of Cabot, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Des Arc... Beebe... Pryor... McRae... Garner... Griffithville... Antioch in White County... Dixie... Vinity Corner... Sand Hill... Walker... McClelland... Gregory... Hayley... Hickory Plains... Jasmine... Georgetown... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
